explanation: MHD_strx_to_uint32_n_ directly calls toxdigitvalue. To determine whether MHD_strx_to_uint32_n_ violates the MISRA recursion rule you must examine the implementation (and any transitive callees) of toxdigitvalue to ensure it does not call, directly or indirectly, MHD_strx_to_uint32_n_ (or any chain that leads back to it). If toxdigitvalue itself calls other functions, their definitions would also be required transitively; start by providing the toxdigitvalue definition so the call graph can be checked for any path back to MHD_strx_to_uint32_n_.
